TopicTitle: KSP birthday cake (title screen Mun crash)

Articles.Content:
What kind of 28 year old gets computer game theme cakes? A 28 year old married to a professional baker and decorator. To celebrate my birthday (and coincidentally, the release of .24) my wife surprised me with this.

Please note, my wife does not actually play KSP and the entire design is based off what she saw when I played the game. So it's not going to be ultra accurate. Even so, that's definitely a poodle engine attached to the lander.
